summary:
Accelerating the transition to Smart Accounts - Safe is the account abstraction leader on Ethereum and the EVM with the most secure smart wallet infrastructure and platform

 Safe accounts hold and protect billions of $$$ in assets - Previously called Gnosis Safe, Safe spun out with a mission to build a better standard for ownership with smart accounts

 Available on 14+ networks - Ethereum Mainnet, BNB Smart Chain, Optimism, Arbitrum, zkSync Era Mainnet, Polygon, Avalanche, Gnosis Chain, Aurora, Celo

 Trusted by the best - Developers, Safe CORE, Safe WALLET

 Safe CORE powers 190+ ecosystem projects - including projects building DAO tools, DeFi, NFT collectives and institutional custody

 Our contracts are the most battle-tested - Since 2018, our smart contracts have passed the highest possible security standards in the industry including Formal Verification

 Safe DAO governs the future of Safe - Safe is governed by SafeDAO, a decentralized collective of core contributors, backers, GnosisDAO, users and ecosystem contributors i.e Safe Guardians

 Want to reach the core contributors? - Contact us

 Use Safe WALLET anywhere - Access your assets anywhere without compromising on security with our flagship interfaces built on Safe Core
